problems.problem: You don't know if the client viewed your document
problemDetails: Once you send a file through Drive or email, there is zero visibility.
How many times they viewed it
solutionFeatures: Auto notifications when the file is opened

problems.problem: Follow-ups are missed, costing you deals
problemDetails: Businesses lose clients simply because they forget to follow up.
Most tools don't alert you when clients engage with your files.
solutionFeatures: Manual trigger option for immediate outreach

problems.problem: Your brand marketing lacks professional impact
problemDetails: Generic file-sharing links don't reflect your brand identity.
No way to customize the viewer experience with your branding.
Missed opportunity to showcase your professionalism.
Competitors using branded solutions gain more trust.
solutionFeatures: Add your logo and brand colors
Consistent brand experience across all shares

problems.problem: Security concerns put your business at risk
problemDetails: Sensitive documents shared without proper protection.
No control over who accesses or downloads your files.
Risk of unauthorized sharing and data leaks.
